name: Fear (Plague of Minds)
description:
Fear is a combat platformer developed for the  GMTK Game Jam for August of 2019 for the "Only One" theme by the team Plague of Minds.   For this game, the "only one" theme is fulfilled by the fact that everything dies with just 1 hit, including you!  This is the second game the team has developed using Unity on a Game Jam.   All original art, music, SFX, and programming were done from scratch within the 48 period by the team.  Rooms are randomly picked so that each play through is different. Thanks for taking the time to review our work.  

The overall theme of the artwork was inspired by the silhouette stop motion animation of Lotte Reiniger.
